data.title: PDF lecture notes of various courses by Leonard Susskind
data.meta_description: Leonard Susskind had recorded many video lectures across many branches of physics and all of can be found on this official website. Pdf versions of three of the video courses (taken and shared by s...
data.text:
Leonard Susskind had recorded many video lectures across many branches of physics and all of can be found on this official website. Pdf versions of three of the video courses (taken and shared by some generous person) are available in the following links to download for free

Statistical Mechanics and Thermodynamics,

General Relativity,

Cosmology.

There also exist three textbooks by Susskind based on these videos lectures (and I own all of them)

Classical mechanics,

Quantum Mechanics,

Special Relativity and Classical theory of fields.
